data.title: Ziziphus nummularia Phytoconstituents and Pharmacological Prop...

data.text: The genus Ziziphus of the Rhamnaceae family contains over 58 accepted species of thorny shrubs and small trees growing mostly in arid and semi-arid regions. Species of this genus are traditionally known for their health benefits, nutritional values, and therapeutic properties, as described by various cultures around the world, specifically in India, Pakistan, China and the Middle East.
